about.title: About LABANDA
about.intro: LABANDA Industrie Services supports governments, institutions and financing organizations in the implementation of major projects: cathedrals, urban planning, universities and sustainable infrastructure.
about.history_text: Founded with the vision of contributing to the sustainable development of Central Africa, LABANDA Industrie Services has established itself as a trusted partner for governmental and institutional projects.
about.mission_text: Design and build sustainable infrastructure that transforms communities and supports economic growth in Central African nations through architectural excellence and innovation.
about.vision_text: To be the leading provider of architecture and strategic infrastructure in Central Africa, recognized for our technical excellence and commitment to sustainable development.
